features: ★Nine free accessories to adapt cleaner to every situation: Stairs, carpet, clothing, car interior and rims, etc. Gets into hard to reach areas

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-Purpose Whole House Cleaner Steam cleaner cleans in one simple step. No bucket and no chemical cleaners needed!

Flat Surface Tool Great for steam cleaning larger areas above floors. High heat steam quickly melts away stubborn spills on non-porus surfaces Brush Away Grease and Grime The attachable utility brushes are ideal for use on many surfaces around the home, including carpet, ceramic tile, grouting, and more. Clothing Steamer Tool Use to steam clean clothing, curtains, upholstery, pet beds, and other fabrics Powerful Jet Nozzle The powerful jet nozzle focuses the flow of steam to release dirt and grime.

High-Powered Cleaning A lot of materials are washed down your sink, which makes it the perfect breeding ground. Steam it all away with the Steam Machine. Extension Hose The 9.8-inch extension hose provides additional freedom to easily reach a variety of spaces. Cleans Sofas and Furniture Apply steam to upholstered surfaces keeping it moving so you do not soak the fabric. The heat of the steam kills dust mites and helps remove stains. Lockable Steam Trigger Steam longer without holding the trigger, or simply use the trigger for on-demand steam.

Open the Cap Apply continuous pressure (push down) to turn the cap anticlockwise until it is open. Fill Water Fill with no more than 250ml of water. Close the cap Close the cap by rotating it clockwise. Connect the Plug Connect to the power source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This brand last for 1 to 2 years
reviews.reviewText: This is my second on in 2 years they seem to last 1 to 2 years. But the pricing is good for what it can do. I clean ovens and oven glass and it works well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is thing is actually better than my expensive steam cleaner that died on me!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My other, expensive steam cleaner died on me so I looked around online to find a replacement and came across this one. Just wanted something kind of inexpensive this time but still had decent reviews. Didn't expect it to be this high quality though for the price!First: I love the locking mechanism on the button. My old steamer had this button that was WAY too easy to press and I hit it accidentally on several occasions (in one instance, even burning my inner forearm). This one locks so you don't accidentally press it.Also loving some of these attachments like the squeegee attachment. Amazing for cleaning stuff like a dirty bath tub... I work on cars and motorcycles a lot so I get pretty dirty... which equals my shower/bath tub getting pretty dirty. I gotta scrub clean it like once or twice a week to keep it somewhat clean but as you can see in the video, it still gets this... what I assume is grease and filth from the car parts everywhere. Near impossible to get off with a scrub brush but this steam cleaner with the squeegee attachment does the trick in seconds. Couldn't be happier with that. My old steam cleaner couldn't even do that.Also, this thing heats up SO MUCH FASTER and puts out more steam than my old one did. Makes cleaning car interiors (like the plastic siding), shoes, bathtubs, tile floors, etc. SO MUCH faster than before. I'm using this thing on everything I own now with all these attachments, haha.Anyway, I felt like I needed to actually take the time to review this one since I was just so impressed with how much better it is than my old one - even though it's like half the price. Now I feel like I got scammed by my old steam cleaner, heh. Hope this info and video is helpful for someone out there. Don't normally do video reviews unless it's something I'm really impressed with :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't for me.
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought this and a Bissell. Difference between the two. This one comes with a funnel. Also has a safety on the trigger switch. But the Bissell seems better built. As when I got this one. For some reason it stopped working. Light stayed on and it just stopped boiling. I don't know if it's a defect. But I had to send it back. As for the Bissell. It's heavier with no safety switch. Steam comes out better. I need to stick to the best sellers. I'm sorry but this one isn't for me because of it breaking down. As for the Bissell, it's the mint green one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Working/Injury Risk
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered the steam cleaner for a family member, but ended up keeping it for myself since she purchased one. I finally had a use for it after it had been sitting on a shelf in my laundry room for a year.I read the instructions for proper operation before doing anything with the unit. I do love the various attachments that come with the steam cleaner. I noticed when I opened the cleaner to pour in the water, there were what appeared to be hard water spots around the top and the metal part of the lid that screws in is rusty and there looks to be some chunks of clear plastic around the metal on the lid. I didn’t order a used/refurbished unit but it appeared that is what I was sent and the seller didn’t bother to clean it up upon receiving it before shipping it to me.I filled the unit with the recommended amount of water, making sure not to add more than recommended. I screwed on the lid and plugged it in. After a few minutes, the unit started making sound and I heard a pop (assuming that was the lid popping up). Immediately, steam and hot water started spraying out from under the lid and hot water started dripping down the side of the unit. I’m thankful I didn’t get burned. Immediately I unplugged it and let it cool. I re read the manual and after several hours, I unscrewed the lid and poured the water out. Along with the water, sand came out of the unit as did flakes of a white substance. I poured cold water in and dumped it out to give the unit a good rinse.I decided to give it a second try and poured water in, only using 175 ml. I screwed the lid on and plugged in the unit. The orange light came on when I plugged it in. It has been about 15 minutes now and I pulled the trigger to use it and nothing is happening. No steam, no water, nothing. It’s not even making sounds.I am disappointed that I received such a poor quality steam cleaner. If it worked, it would be such a handy tool to use around and house and it’s easy to move due to the compact size. Unfortunately, I don’t feel it’s worth the money or the risk of injury.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty great so far, but my hands are small...
reviews.reviewText: So the trigger can be A LOT to fight with and its slightly bulky but I quickly adjusted. I used this in an old shower that wasnt getting clean any other way (1980s weird PVC/Plastic pan and etched, with a person who loves charcol soap sooooo.) I was desperately trying to find something to replace my shark lift away that gave up the ghost. Came across this as a quick find, and wow. The steam DOES get hot. I like the ease of attachments, especially the fabric steamer tool, in the shower it worked awesome on the walls. Tried the window tool, not great. Steam, grab my old microfiber cloth (its a hardy beast), wipe. It actually got all the gunk off the walls, the rim of the pan and just outside. (Will not embarrass myself with pictures). Not too shabby of a steamer at all. Still trying to attack the pan and the BIG NASTY, but the ring around it is CLEAN for the first time, and Ive literally tried all the new stuff and old wives tricks. Im not gross, its just a bad shower, PERIOD.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for detail cleaning and sanitizing
reviews.reviewText: This powerful steam cleaner comes with a fantastic bonus - a free 9-piece accessory kit that includes everything you need for a thorough cleaning.The first thing that impressed me about this steam cleaner is its power. With 1050W of power and a large capacity of up to 350ML, it can emit pressurized hot steam (250-270F) for up to 20 minutes. This makes it perfect for tackling tough grease, grout, and stains. I found that it effortlessly cut through any mess, leaving surfaces clean and sanitized.One of the best features of this steam cleaner is that it is 100% chemical-free and safe to use. There are no harmful fumes or residue left behind, making it a great choice for those with allergies or sensitivities. It also includes a safety lock and cap for extra protection, ensuring your safety while using it.I was impressed with the versatility of this steam cleaner. It is suitable for use on a variety of surfaces, including ceramic, vinyl, laminate, granite, marble, and hardwood floors. It is also great for cleaning sinks, stoves, countertops, refrigerators, and even windows. I found it particularly useful for cleaning bathroom surfaces, such as tiles, shower curtains, and toilets. It even works well on car seats, rims, and BBQ grills.The all-in-one design of this steam cleaner makes it incredibly convenient. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver, making it perfect for tackling any cleaning task. The included accessories, such as the extended nozzle, spray cup with brush, and bent spray, make it even more versatile and efficient.The Comforday Handheld Multi-Purpose Pressurized Steam Cleaner is a powerful and effective cleaning tool that is safe to use and comes with a great range of accessories. Whether you need to clean your kitchen, bathroom, car, or any other surface, this steam cleaner is up to the task.I have yet to use all of the accessories that came with this Steam Cleaner. But as far as detail steam cleaning goes, this thing is a little beast.
Es muy bueno el producto solo que se ermitaño muy rápida rob el agua y tienes que pegar la vaporera a la superficie que quieras limpiar pero funciona muy bien

It is nice with convinient accessories. It is good to remove grease or oil in oven, range, range hoods. The only concern is the tank is only handle 250ml water, if you refill the water, the plastic funnel will contact with hot cupper.

El vapor dura unos 15 a 20 minutos y posteriormente hay que esperar media hora para poder abrirla y rellenar con más agua, por lo que no se puede usar continuamente. El vapor sale con buena presión y temperatura. El aditamento para limpiar colchón o tapices es pequeño, si fuera más grande se podría abarcar más superficie y sería más ágil la limpieza. Es cansado apretar el gatillo todo el tiempo. El aditamento para limpiar vidrios es genial, te facilita la limpieza de los mismos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great tool for cleaning engines, motorcycles, etc
reviews.reviewText: A great addition to cleaning up the engine bay of our new car. Went over the engine bay once, scrubbed with degreaser, and went over it again to wash it away and wipe up the excess. Can't believe how clean it got without risk of damage. Engine bay looks as good as the day it left the showroom.Works great on baked on bugs from the front of the motorcycle as well.Only downside is you need to use distilled water. Anything else will cause scaling and will cause premature failure
